heading: HB07123
0: AN ACT CREATING ONE (1) ADDITIONAL BRANCH IN THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT IN THE 10TH JUDICIAL REGION TO BE STATIONED  IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF QUEZON, PROVINCE OF BUKIDNON, FURTHER AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980" AS AMENDED, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
